thread.title: 50 Degrees | Best Life Ever | with Super-mom Taylor Wells
thread.title_full: 50 Degrees | Best Life Ever | with Super-mom Taylor Wells | Boston Herald

author: Taylor Wells
title: 50 Degrees | Best Life Ever | with Super-mom Taylor Wells
text:
Quote: of the day:
“Be careful how you interpret the world: It is like that.”
~Erich Heller
Everything is relative.
Note how we New Englanders dress when it’s 50 degrees Fahrenheit in September . . . and how we dress when it’s 50 degrees Fahrenheit in March.
(September = bundled up . . . March = shorts and flip flops).
It’s the SAME TEMPERATURE! But oh so different.
Everything is relative.
Live an Inspired Life.
Namaste!
Taylor plus 5
